context: The Estonian word 'kõiges' is an adessive case form of the pronoun 'kõik' (everything/all). It means 'in everything', 'in all things', or 'in every respect'. This grammatical case indicates location or state within something, so it's used to express being positioned within or encompassed by everything. The word is commonly used in contexts where someone wants to emphasize comprehensiveness or totality of a situation.
